Articles.Content:
Personally im the kinda of person to save the game everytime I finish or start something. (I have trauma from the tens of times I did not save)

But saving this often clogs up the save folder, and requires a bit more space on my computer. This was not a problem in ksp 1 as you had this feature,

however ksp 2 simply lacks this feature, and you can not delete saves without going into the files. I mean sure you can overwrite them but I would like to have a timeline of saves, that I could delete later when Im done the mission.

This would be a simple, but useful feature for me, and probably a bunch others.
 

Thanks for reading

Edited March 25, 2023 by Little 908
